Experience

Retrolux | Boise, Idaho

Full Stack Developer | May 2018-Current
  • Ruby on Rails and React Native environments.
  • Retrolux is a monolith that helps the lighting industry perform quicker enegy audits.
  • I designed and built a revamp to our calculations engine. Adding in line items. This gives our users complete control over their proposal costs.
  • Challenges:
    • Implementing a checksum auto update and calculate user changes.
    • And creating an Single Page App feel to the line item experience.
  • Created a mapping feature where a user can drag and drop pins indicating locations on a building floor plan. This was our users most requested feature for over 1.5 years.
  • Challenges:
    • Dragging the pins over a specific interactive space.
    • Mimicking the touch functionality on both web and mobile experiences.
    • Building out the sync layer to handle all of the additional changes.

Boise CodeWorks | Boise, Idaho

Immersive Full-stack Grad | Jan 2018-April 2018
  • An immersive developer school. Around 520 hours of programming & learning industry best practices.
  • Created 4 full-stack applications utilizing multiple programming languages & frameworks - HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Vue.js, Node.js, MongoDB, C#, & .NET.

Verandah Sportswear | Boise, Idaho

Graphic Designer | Oct 2016-June 2017 (temp position)
  • Created packaging, designed apparel, communicated art details to manufacturers, edited E-commerce websites, and provided client presentations.

SurveyMonkey | Portland, Oregon

Account Manager/Renewals | Nov 2014-May 2016
  • Joined SurveyMonkey right after they acquired FluidSurveys.
  • Maintained relationships with all sales assisted FluidSurveys customers - $4.3 million in yearly revenue.
  • Managed customer accounts, renewed yearly subscriptions, and upsold licenses.
  • Retained a less than 10% churn rate.
  • Worked daily with our legal, finance, and sales operation teams to complete contracts, invoice customers, forecast, and track growth.

Sweatshorts.co | Portland, Oregon

Content Creator/SEO/Owner | 2014-present
  • Sweatshorts.co is a niche clothing website that utilizes search engine optimization (SEO) to drive traffic and sales.
  • Taught myself SEO, Google Analytics, advertising copy, email marketing, and most importantly, white-hat link building techniques.
  • Currently on the first page of Google for a keyword (sweat shorts) that exceeds 12k searches a month.

Gameday Media | Portland, Oregon

Graphic Desinger | June 2012-Nov 2013
  • Designed 80-page media guides for sporting events using the Adobe Creative Suite.
  • Communicated directly with clients to create their vision.
  • Handled a hodgepodge of client submitted files to produce articles, rosters, team photos, and additional content.
  • Completed work on strict print deadlines. Sometimes putting in long nights to make last minute changes.

MeetMe@

MeetMe@ was built on the Vue js framework, MongoDB, Google Api, and Bootstrap. It is an app that allows users to find a midpoint between two locations and search resturants, coffee shops, etc. - around that midpoint.
